task_description: 生成鸡汤3D ICON图 - Pixar卡通风格，Q版可爱，商业级质量

input_data.text_prompt: A 3D cartoon-style icon of a cute chicken soup bowl, Pixar aesthetic, ultra-detailed commercial quality. A white ceramic bowl with rounded shape (#F5F5DC) filled with golden chicken soup (#FFD700, #FFA500). Visible ingredients: tender chicken pieces (#FFEFD5), red dates (#8B0000), goji berries (#FF6347), cilantro garnish (#90EE90). Bowl features high-gloss ceramic texture with soft reflections. Soup surface shows appetizing sheen with gentle ripples. Optional: steam wisps rising elegantly. 3/4 bird's-eye view angle. Studio lighting setup: top light + 45-degree front light creating warm, inviting ambiance. Pure white or transparent background for commercial use. Rendered in Blender/Cinema 4D style with perfect subsurface scattering, realistic material properties, and Pixar-level charm. 1024x1024px square format, vector-quality sharpness, food photography appeal, strong appetite stimulation, healing warm atmosphere.
design_requirements: 白色陶瓷碗质感，高光效果
配料清晰可见：鸡肉、红枣、枸杞、香菜
强烈食欲感和温暖治愈感
商业级质量，矢量级锐度
input_data.negative_prompt: flat 2D, low quality, blurry, pixelated, dark lighting, ugly, unappetizing, dirty, messy, realistic photo, overcooked, burnt, cold, unappetizing colors, dull, lifeless, amateur

metadata.notes: 参考吼巷IP设计风格，3D卡通美学，Pixar级别渲染质量
